sections.heading: Overview
content:
Richard Hansen, DMD, has a state-of-the-art private dentistry practice in
Fullerton, CA, and is on the faculty of the University of California at Los
Angeles Center for Esthetic Dentistry. His mission is to provide the most
advanced, comfortable, patient-centered dental care available.

Hansen received his bachelor's degree in biological sciences from the
University of Southern California and his degree in dentistry from Washington
University. He is a member of many professional medical and dental societies
and has authored numerous articles and papers on high-tech dentistry. He has
traveled across the United States making presentations on advances in dental
technology.

Hansen has appeared on many nationally televised programs, including
"Donahue," "Extra," The Discovery Channel, C/NET and ABC, CBS,
and NBC news shows.
